account_id.description: internal ID used by bank for transaction search API

account_number.description: number used by kasisto - may be masked

can_transfer_to.description: True if account is a valid transfer destination

can_transfer_from.description: True if account is eligible to fee waiver

can_pay_payee.description: True if account is a valid pay to payee source

can_waive_fee.description: True if fees for account can be waived

fee_inccured.description: Any fees incurred on the account E.g. monthly / annual fees

meta.description: Optional data if needed for application

account_id.description: ID of account transaction is from

amount.description: Amount of transaction (can be positive or negative)

merchant.description: Merchant or vendor of transaction if provided

payee.description: Payee or biller of transaction if provided

check_number.description: Check number of transaction is a check

location_type.description: The type of point of interest it is

services.description: Array of languages used at the ATM
